pkgmetadata.longdescription: Stabilising Variable Selection // A stable approach to variable selection through stability selection and the use of a permutation-based objective stability threshold. Lima et al (2021) doi:10.1038/s41598-020-79317-8, Meinshausen and Buhlmann (2010) doi:10.1111/j.1467-9868.2010.00740.x.
